data.qoute:
If it makes you smile, giggle or laugh...
Do it again!
data.author: Unknown

data.qoute: If you can't find a way - make one.
data.author: Unknown

data.qoute: If you want something done, ask someone who's already busy.
data.author: Unknown

data.qoute: I'm not here to fit into your world...  I'm here to build my own.
data.author: Unknown

data.qoute: In a dark time, the eye begins to see.
data.author: Unknown

data.qoute: It is not the things we get, but the hearts we touch that will measure our success in life.
data.author: Unknown

data.qoute: It is the hour of trial that makes you great, not the hour of triumph.
data.author: Unknown

data.qoute: It might take a year, it might take a day, but what's meant to be, will always find a way.
data.author: Unknown

data.qoute:
It's impossible, said pride. 
It's risky, said experience.
It's pointless, said reason.
Give it a try, whispered the Heart.
data.author: Unknown

data.qoute: Just because it's not what you were expecting, doesn't mean it's not everything you've ever needed.
data.author: Unknown
